product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer Down Vest - Men's
long_description: Filled with super-compressible 850-fill-power water-resistant down and weighing a mere 5 oz., the Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down vest is the ultimate lightweight layering piece. Water-resistant down retains its loft and warmth even when wet. Shell is ultralight 7-denier nylon. Two front handwarmer pockets. Lightweight single-pull hem drawcord. Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down vest stows in its own pocket.
short_description: Filled with super-compressible 850-fill-power water-resistant down and weighing a mere 5 oz., the Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down vest is the ultimate lightweight layering piece.
